title.rendered: Tickets for the Qatar 2022 World Cup: prices and when they are sold

content.rendered:
This Wednesday the application period to buy tickets for the World Cup opened. I know how to do it and how much they cost.

The World Cup in Qatar 2022 It will take place from November 21, 2022 and thousands of fans around the world are already beginning to experience it. For that reason, today started the second period for the ticket purchase for the maximum appointment. Find out how to buy tickets and what the prices are.

World Cup Qatar 2022: how to buy tickets

The first lottery sale period ended on February 8, 2022. However, the fans can reapply for tickets for the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 from this Wednesday, March 23, 2022 at 7:00 a.m. in Argentina and until next Tuesday at the same time.

“Fans may reapply for tickets to the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 during the Sales Phase First Come First Served Sales Period (1) which begins on March 23, 2022 at 11:00 CET / 13 :00 Doha time and ends on March 29, 2022 at 11:00 CET / 12:00 (noon) Doha time”explains FIFA on its website.

In turn, the statement clarifies that “dDuring this sale period, tickets will be allocated (subject to availability) on a first-come, first-served basis, and ticket purchases will be processed as a real-time transaction. All successfully purchased tickets will be immediately confirmed to ticket applicants.”

Step by step to buy tickets for the Qatar 2022 World Cup

  • First of all, you have to enter the FIFA official website
  • Then you must select the window that says “International: order your tickets here”
  • Thirdly, you have to log in with your account on the FIFA page or, in case you are not registered, create a new account.
  • After logging in, the website will ask you to submit or edit the order for the ticket request.
  • Finally, the three packages offered appear, which are: for the opening match, a season ticket for four games in different stadiums and a national team season ticket.
  • After selecting your country, you will be asked whether or not to accept entries in another category. Here you have to keep in mind that the “total price may increase/decrease if a higher/lower ticket category is assigned”.
  • Finally, you must read the Terms and Conditions, and once accepted, your request will be confirmed via email. Once the seven steps have been completed, all that remains is to wait to be drawn.

How much are tickets for Qatar 2022

For international fans there are three possible ticket categories with different prices per match. For example, for the opening match an individual ticket has a value of $617 in category 1, $440 in category 2 and $302 in category 3.

For those who are already thinking of following a particular team, like Argentina, they can buy three different packages of 3 matches, 4 matches or 7 matches. To support Argentina in the group stage the value is 725 dollars in category 1, 543 in category 2 and 227 dollars in category 3. If you want to add the match of an eventual round of 16, the prices amount to $1,027, $770, and $332 respectively. For those who already wish to acquire the complete package in case Argentina reaches a final again, the cost would be 4,314 dollars in category 1, 2,915 in category two and 1,616 in category three.

Under FIFA’s ticketing policy, in place for three World Cup editions, a special price category, 4, was reserved for residents of the host countrywho will be able to request seats from as little as 40 Qatari riyals (about 11 dollars).
